abstract: With InBev winning its battle for Anheuser-Busch, Yahoo bashing the latest offer from Microsoft and Waste Management making an unsolicited run at rival Republic Services, it may seem as if unsolicited and hostile deals are on the rise. But data provided by Thompson Reuters suggest otherwise.
lead_paragraph: With InBev winning its battle for Anheuser-Busch, Yahoo bashing the latest offer from Microsoft and Waste Management making an unsolicited run at rival Republic Services, it may seem as if unsolicited and hostile deals are on the rise. But data provided by Thompson Reuters suggest otherwise.

headline.main: Hostile Tendencies, or Just a Few Big Feuds?
